main event: An unknown metallic disc-shaped object was observed hovering in the sky over Tulsa, Oklahoma on December 6, 1957, before accelerating and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and metallic in appearance, consistent with classic UFO descriptions.
It was observed hovering in the sky for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing, indicating advanced speed and maneuverability.
No sound was reported to be associated with the object, adding to the mystery of its nature.
The sighting was reported to the Air Force and investigated as part of Project Blue Book, a program dedicated to the study of UFOs.
The report includes 1 photo, suggesting potential visual evidence of the metallic object.
